item.description:
Happy New Year - Come ring in the New Year at the Wedeln Ski and Outdoors Club. Its only $20 per night. There will be dinner (optional) and a party (optional) that you can attend.

Wed Night (12/31)

Arrive no later than 4 PM

Optional - Dinner
At 6pm on December 31, we will transform our party room into a white tablecloth dining room.

Each course below will be served with a specially chosen wine:

1st Passed appetizers with Sparkling wine
2nd Spiced Pumpkin Soup
3rd Frisee Salad w/ Cranberry-Walnut Vinaigrette
4th Herb Roasted Pork Tenderloin w/ Mustard Sauce and Roasted Root Vegetables
Dessert TBA


Cost $45 - $50 per person all-inclusive.

Optional - NYE event ($15)
Held at a sister club 1 mile down the road
VINTAGE FOMAL ATTIRE - optional.
From 9 PM - 2AM

Thursday (1/1) - Ski, take lessons, or shop for post Christmas bargains at North Conway Outlets - Then either stay one more night or head for home....

Note:
- NYE dinner is limited availability.
- This meetup is just for NYE (12/31 - 1/2) (Wed Night - Friday Morning) . If you would like to stay longer, please sign up for the other meetup event as well - but I will need to know how long you plan to be there.
- You will need to pay guest fee ($20 per night), Dinner ($45 - $50), party ($15) when you arrive.

Please let me know if you have any questions, issues, or concerns.

Regards,
Jonathan Magsino
item.how_to_find_us: Just come in - You will find all the Wedelns!
item.name: NYE and New Year's Day @ Wedeln Ski and Outdoors Club
